message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% - take it or leave it.
I understand you want to be fair, Alice, but inflation hits me harder. Let's be realistic - 60/40 my way.
Bob, let's be sensible. This offer still gives you a good deal considering the inflation. It's better to agree now than lose more later.
Alice, I'm willing to compromise, but the deal has to be fair. 55/45 is my final offer.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm lowering my offer again, but this is the last time. Agree now, or we both lose out.
